title: What is Flutter?
subtitle: an open source framework by Google for building beautiful, natively compiled, multi-platform applications from a single codebase.

title: Trusted by many
subtitle: Flutter is supported and used by Google, trusted by well-known brands around the world, and maintained by a community of global developers.

title: Transform your workflow
subtitle: Take control of your codebase with automated testing, developer tooling, and everything else you need to build production-quality apps.
